Class Purchase

java.lang.Object
  Purchase

public class Purchase
extends java.lang.Object

Class for the purchase of one kind of item, such as 3 oranges. Prices are set supermarket style, such as 5 for $1.25.

Constructor Summary
Purchase()

          Returns name of product

          Sets number bought.
 void setPrice(int count, double costForCount)
          Sets price to groupCount pieces for $costForCount.
 void writeOutput()
          Outputs price and number being purchased to screen.

setPrice

public void setPrice(int count,
                     double costForCount)
